接口 SystemRecordInter

  • 所有已知实现类:
    SystemRecordImpl

    public interface SystemRecordInter

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean addBillRecord(SystemRecord bill)
      This method is used to add new bill record into Bill.txt.
      boolean addNewElectricityRecord(ElectricitySystemRecord electricitysystemrecord)
      This method is used to add new electricity meter read into ElectricitySystemRecord.txt.
      boolean addNewGasRecord(GasSystemRecord gassystemrecord)
      This method is used to add new gas meter read into GasSystemRecord.txt.
      boolean addNewRecord(SystemRecord[][] systemrecord2)
      This method is used to add new meter read into SystemRecord.txt.
      boolean checkElectricitySameRecord(int id, int year, int month, int day)
      This method is used to check whether the ElectricitySystemRecord object which include the id, year, month, day is same as the ElectricitySystemRecord object in ElectricitySystemRecord.txt.
      boolean checkGasSameRecord(int id, int year, int month, int day)
      This method is used to check whether the GasSystemRecord object which include the id, year, month, day is same as the GasSystemRecord object in GasSystemRecord.txt.
      boolean checkSameRecord(int id, int year, int month, int day)
      This method is used to check whether the SystemRecord object which include the id, year, month, day is same as the SystemRecord object in SystemRecord.txt.
      java.util.ArrayList<SystemRecord> getBillById(int id)
      This method is used to get a user's all SystemRecord list from Bill.txt by the id.
      java.util.ArrayList<ElectricitySystemRecord> getElectricityRecordById(int id)
      This method is used to get a user's all ElectricitySystemRecord list from ElectricitySystemRecotd.txt by the id.
      ElectricitySystemRecord getElectricityRecordByIdDate(int id, int year, int month, int day)
      This method is used to get a ElectricitySystemRecord object from ElectricitySystemRecotd.txt by the id, year, month, day.
      java.util.ArrayList<GasSystemRecord> getGasRecordById(int id)
      This method is used to get a user's all GasSystemRecord list from GasSystemRecord.txt by the id.
      GasSystemRecord getGasRecordByIdDate(int id, int year, int month, int day)
      This method is used to get a GasSystemRecord object from GasSystemRecord.txt by the id, year, month, day.
      java.util.ArrayList<SystemRecord> getRecordById(int id)
      This method is used to get a user's all SystemRecord list from SystemRecord.txt by the id.
      SystemRecord getRecordByIdDate(int id, int year, int month, int day)
      This method is used to get a SystemRecord object from SystemRecotd.txt by the id, year, month, day.
      void updateEFirstTime(int id, int year, int month, int day, int hour, int minute, int second)
      This method is used to modify the first electricity time in ElectricitySystemRecord.txt.
      void updateElectricityRecord(int id, int year, int month, int day, float usage)
      This method is used to modify the electricity usage in ElectricitySystemRecord.txt.
      void updateETotalTime(int id, int year, int month, int day, int time)
      This method is used to modify the electricity total time in ElectricitySystemRecord.txt.
      void updateGasRecord(int id, int year, int month, int day, float usage)
      This method is used to modify the gas usage in GasSystemRecord.txt.

      This method is used to modify the first gas time in GasSystemRecord.txt.
      void updateGTotalTime(int id, int year, int month, int day, int time)
      This method is used to modify the gas total time in GasSystemRecord.txt.

      This method is used to modify the usage, price, time of gas and electricity in GasSystemRecord.txt.
      void updateSystemRecordTariff(int id, int year, int month)
      This method is used to modify record tariff in SystemRecord.txt.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addNewRecord

        boolean addNewRecord(SystemRecord[][] systemrecord2)
        This method is used to add new meter read into SystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        systemrecord2 - The SystemRecord object list which need to be stored into 'txt' file.
        返回:
        The return value indicate whether the operation finish.

      • addNewElectricityRecord

        boolean addNewElectricityRecord(ElectricitySystemRecord electricitysystemrecord)
        This method is used to add new electricity meter read into ElectricitySystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        electricitysystemrecord - The ElectricitySystemRecord object which need to be stored into 'txt' file.
        返回:
        The return value indicate whether the operation finish.

      • addNewGasRecord

        boolean addNewGasRecord(GasSystemRecord gassystemrecord)
        This method is used to add new gas meter read into GasSystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        gassystemrecord - The GasSystemRecord object which need to be stored into 'txt' file.
        返回:
        The return value indicate whether the operation finish.

      • addBillRecord

        boolean addBillRecord(SystemRecord bill)
        This method is used to add new bill record into Bill.txt.
        参数:
        bill - The SystemRecord object which need to be stored into 'txt' file.
        返回:
        The return value indicate whether the operation finish.

      • updateETotalTime

        void updateETotalTime(int id,
                      int year,
                      int month,
                      int day,
                      int time)
        This method is used to modify the electricity total time in ElectricitySystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        id - The user id.
        year - The year of meter read.
        month - The month of meter read.
        day - The day of meter read.
        time - The time of meter read.

      • updateGTotalTime

        void updateGTotalTime(int id,
                      int year,
                      int month,
                      int day,
                      int time)
        This method is used to modify the gas total time in GasSystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        id - The user id.
        year - The year of meter read.
        month - The month of meter read.
        day - The day of meter read.
        time - The time of meter read.

      • updateEFirstTime

        void updateEFirstTime(int id,
                      int year,
                      int month,
                      int day,
                      int hour,
                      int minute,
                      int second)
        This method is used to modify the first electricity time in ElectricitySystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        id - The user id.
        year - The year of meter read.
        month - The month of meter read.
        day - The day of meter read.
        hour - The hour of meter read.
        minute - The minute of meter read.
        second - The second of meter read.

                      int year,
                      int month,

                      int hour,

                      int second)
        This method is used to modify the first gas time in GasSystemRecord.txt.

        year - The year of meter read.
        month - The month of meter read.
        day - The day of meter read.
        hour - The hour of meter read.
        minute - The minute of meter read.
        second - The second of meter read.

      • updateElectricityRecord

        void updateElectricityRecord(int id,
                             int year,
                             int month,
                             int day,
                             float usage)
        This method is used to modify the electricity usage in ElectricitySystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        id - The user id.
        year - The year of meter read.
        month - The month of meter read.
        day - The day of meter read.
        usage - The usage of electricity.

      • updateGasRecord

        void updateGasRecord(int id,
                     int year,
                     int month,
                     int day,
                     float usage)
        This method is used to modify the gas usage in GasSystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        id - The user id.
        year - The year of meter read.
        month - The month of meter read.
        day - The day of meter read.
        usage - The usage of gas.

      • updateSystemRecord

        void updateSystemRecord(int id,
                        int year,
                        int month,
                        int day,
                        float ele_usage,
                        float ele_price,
                        float gas_usage,
                        float gas_price,
                        int ele_time,
                        int gas_time)
        This method is used to modify the usage, price, time of gas and electricity in GasSystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        id - The user id.
        year - The year of meter read.
        month - The month of meter read.
        day - The day of meter read.
        ele_usage - The usage of electricity.
        ele_price - The price of electricity.
        gas_usage - The usage of gas.
        gas_price - The price of gas.
        ele_time - The time of electricity.
        gas_time - The time of gas.

      • updateSystemRecordTariff

        void updateSystemRecordTariff(int id,
                              int year,
                              int month)
        This method is used to modify record tariff in SystemRecord.txt.
        参数:
        id - The user id.
        year - The year of meter read.
        month - The month of meter read.

        month - The month of meter read.
        返回:
        The return value is the result of querying.
